XXvinv05_u:357: sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:358: svāgataṃ śroṇa mā tṛṣito 'si mā bubhukṣito 'si
XXvinv05_u:361: nūnam ayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati /
XXvinv05_u:365: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthitaḥ yāvat suryasyāstaṃgamanakālasamayaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:374: tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvad uparimastakaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yāvat sa eva sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamayaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:375: tataḥ paścāt punar api tad vimānaṃ
XXvinv05_u:378: sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanas tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati
XXvinv05_u:390: bhadramukhāniṣṭo 'sya karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko virama tvam asmāt pāpakād
XXvinv05_u:396: tathāpy ahaṃ tasmāt pāpakād asaddharmān na prativiramāmi /
XXvinv05_u:398: bhadramukha paradārān kiṃ tvaṃ divā gacchasyāhosvid rātrau /
XXvinv05_u:402: bhadramukha divā kiṃ na śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāsi /
XXvinv05_u:403: mayā tasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ (MSV IV 175) gṛhītam* /
XXvinv05_u:404: yat tan mayāryasya mahākātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
XXvinv05_u:405: yat tad rātrau paradārābhigamanaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāv evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi
XXvinv05_u:408: tasyaitat karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ hy anubhavāmi kalyāṇapāpakam* //
XXvinv05_u:419: śroṇa yadi na śraddadhāsyati vaktavyaḥ tava pitrāgniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇakalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:420: tam uddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya asmākaṃ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya /
XXvinv05_u:421: apy evaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet /
XXvinv05_u:424: tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā /
XXvinv05_u:425: tasyāś caturṣu paryaṅkapādakeṣu catvāraḥ pretā baddhās tiṣṭhanti /
XXvinv05_u:426: sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyanubhāṣitum ārabdhā /
XXvinv05_u:430: nūnaṃ devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati /
XXvinv05_u:434: śroṇa yady ete kiñcin mṛgayanti mā dāsyasīty uktvā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ karma svakṛtaṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā /
XXvinv05_u:436: śroṇa kāruṇikas tvaṃ bubhukṣitā vayam asmākam anuprayaccha /
XXvinv05_u:443: śroṇa nivāritas tvaṃ mayā kasmāt tvayaiṣāṃ dattam* /
XXvinv05_u:444: kiṃ mama karuṇayā tvam eva kāruṇikataraḥ /
XXvinv05_u:453: ke yūyaṃ kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:456: ahaṃ bhagini pratyakṣadarśī (MSV IV 177) kasmān nābhiśraddadhāsye /
XXvinv05_u:459: mayā nakṣatrarātrau pratyupasthitāyāṃ praṇītam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtam* /
XXvinv05_u:460: āryaś ca (84v = GBM 6.751) mahākātyāyano mamānukampayā vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya
XXvinv05_u:463: cittam abhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prāsādajātayā piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:464: tasyā mama buddhir utpannā svāminam anumodayāmi prāmodyam utpādayiṣyatīti /
XXvinv05_u:467: sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate jñātīnāṃ vā jñātipūjā na kriyate tāvat tvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍakaṃ dattam* /
XXvinv05_u:469: kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti /
XXvinv05_u:471: mama buddhir utpannā putraṃ tāvad anumodayāmi /
XXvinv05_u:475: so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate jñātīnāṃ vā jñātipūjā na kriyate tāvat tvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya
XXvinv05_u:478: kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na bhakṣayatīti /
XXvinv05_u:479: tasya (MSV IV 178) karmaṇo vipākenāyam ayoguḍaṃ bhakṣayati /
XXvinv05_u:480: nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni mama preṣayanti /
XXvinv05_u:482: sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati /
XXvinv05_u:484: kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayatheti /
XXvinv05_u:486: na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ api tu praṇītāny eva praheṇakāni preṣayāmaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:488: vadhūke mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmākaṃ lūhāny upanāmayasi /
XXvinv05_u:490: kiṃ na svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati yāhaṃ tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayāmīti /
XXvinv05_u:491: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati /
XXvinv05_u:492: nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyām ahaṃ dārikāyā haste praṇītāni praheṇakāni datvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi /
XXvinv05_u:493: sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā
XXvinv05_u:496: kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāny asmākaṃ praheṇakāni preṣayasīti /
XXvinv05_u:498: nāhaṃ lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayāmi api tu praṇītāny evāhaṃ preṣayāmīti /
XXvinv05_u:500: dārike mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāny upanāmayasi /
XXvinv05_u:502: kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti /
XXvinv05_u:506: pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇāmi yatraitān satvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyāmīti /
XXvinv05_u:507: yan mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte (85r = GBM 6.752) trayastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyaṃ sāhaṃ mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā pretamaharddhikā saṃvṛttā /
XXvinv05_u:508: śroṇa gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakaṃ tatra mama duhitā veśyāṃ vāhayati /
XXvinv05_u:510: dṛṣṭās te mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrātur jāyā dāsī /
XXvinv05_u:516: śroṇa yadi na śraddadhāsyati vaktavyā tava paurāṇe paitrike vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇās tiṣṭhanti madhye ca sauvarṇadaṇḍakamaṇḍaluḥ /
XXvinv05_u:517: te kathayanti tam uddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya asmākaṃ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya /
XXvinv05_u:518: apy evaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet /
XXvinv05_u:520: evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:525: tayā teṣām eva pretānām ājñā (MSV IV 180) dattā bhavanto gacchata śroṇaṃ koṭīkarṇaṃ suptam eva vāsavagrāmake paitrike udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata /
XXvinv05_u:526: sa tair vāsavagrāmake paitrike udyāne sthāpitaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:527: sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭācchatrāṇi vyajanāny akṣarāṇi likhitāni /
XXvinv05_u:528: yadi tāvac chroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇo jīvati laghv āgamanāya kṣipram āgamanāya cyutaḥ kālagato gatyupapattisthānāt sthānāntaraviśeṣatāyai /
XXvinv05_u:530: yady ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ kasmād bhūyo 'haṃ
XXvinv05_u:532: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇo yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:534: dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭīkarṇam idam avocat* /
XXvinv05_u:535: ehi śroṇa svāgataṃ te dṛṣṭas te śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś ca lokaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:537: dṛṣṭo bhadanta mahākātyāyana labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam* /
XXvinv05_u:539: śroṇa tāṃ tāvat pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ paripūraya yathāgṛhītān sandeśān samarpayeti /
XXvinv05_u:545: bhoḥ puruṣa adya mama pitur dvādaśa varṣāṇi kālagatasya /
XXvinv05_u:546: asti kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ paralokāt (MSV IV 181) punar āgacchan* /
XXvinv05_u:549: bhadramukha yadi na śraddadhāsi sa tava pitā kathayati asisthānādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrṇas tiṣṭhati /
XXvinv05_u:550: tam uddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāsmākaṃ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya /
XXvinv05_u:551: apy evaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet /
XXvinv05_u:553: na kadācid (85v = GBM 6.753) evaṃ mayā śrutapūrvaṃ paśyāmi saced bhūtaṃ
XXvinv05_u:555: tena gatvā khanitaṃ yāvat tat sarvaṃ tat tathaiva tenābhiśraddadhītam* /
XXvinv05_u:556: tataḥ paścāt sa pāradārikasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:563: bhoḥ puruṣa adya mama pitur dvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya /
XXvinv05_u:564: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punar āgacchan* /
XXvinv05_u:568: bhadramukha sacen nābhiśraddadhāsi tava pitrāgniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:570: tam uddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayāryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāsmākaṃ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya /
XXvinv05_u:571: apy evaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet* /
XXvinv05_u:572: sa saṃlakṣayati na kadācid etan mayā śrutapūrvaṃ paśyāmi saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvam etat
XXvinv05_u:574: tena (MSV IV 182) gatvā khanitaṃ yāvat paśyati tat sarvaṃ tat tathaiva tenābhiśraddadhītam*
XXvinv05_u:577: bhagini dṛṣṭas te mayā mātā pitā bhrātur jāyā dāsī /
XXvinv05_u:582: bhoḥ puruṣa adya mama mātāpitror dvādaśa varṣāṇi kālagatayoḥ /
XXvinv05_u:583: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punar āgacchan* /
XXvinv05_u:589: bhagini sacen nābhiśraddadhāsi tava paurāṇe paitrike vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇās tiṣṭhanti /
XXvinv05_u:592: tam uddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayāryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāsmākaṃ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya /
XXvinv05_u:593: apy evaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet* /
XXvinv05_u:595: na kadācin mayā śrutapūrvaṃ paśyāmi saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvam etat satyam* /
XXvinv05_u:596: tayā gatvā khanitaṃ yāvat tat sarvaṃ tat tathaiva tathābhiśraddadhītam* /
XXvinv05_u:599: na tu kaścin mama śraddhayā gacchatīti /
XXvinv05_u:603: syād āryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇaḥ eva me (MSV IV 183) bhagini saṃjānīte /
XXvinv05_u:618: amba tātānujānīdhvaṃ pravrajiṣyāmi samag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikam* /
XXvinv05_u:622: yāvad āvāṃ jīvāvas tāvan na pravrajitavyam* /
XXvinv05_u:624: tenāyuṣmanto mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ mātāpitarau ca śaraṇāgamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau /
XXvinv05_u:630: sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo datvā daridrān adaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:631: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyayanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
XXvinv05_u:632: ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ (MSV IV 184) koṭīkarṇaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanam idam avocat* /
XXvinv05_u:633: labeyāham ārya mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ
XXvinv05_u:639: aśmāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukaṃ kṛcchreṇa daśavargo gaṇaḥ paripūrayate /
XXvinv05_u:641: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ /
XXvinv05_u:642: yaś cāṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ yaś ca kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyām* /
XXvinv05_u:643: tatra ye āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ saṃnipatanti te tāṃs tān uddeśayogamanasikārān udgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣām upagacchanti /
XXvinv05_u:644: ye kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ saṃnipatanti te yathādhigatam ārocayanti /
XXvinv05_u:647: atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃs tān uddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān udgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣām upagatās te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ
XXvinv05_u:648: māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:649: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte (MSV IV 185) niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:650: ekānte niṣadya yathādhigatam ārocayanti uttare ca paripṛcchanti /
XXvinv05_u:655: arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo samaloṣṭrakāṃcanaḥ ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo 'vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo
XXvinv05_u:657: athāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanaṃ yāvat tāvat paryupāsyāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanam idam avocan*
XXvinv05_u:661: paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:662: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇas tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo
XXvinv05_u:664: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanas tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanam idam
XXvinv05_u:666: dṛṣṭo mayopādhyāyānubhāvena (86v = GBM 6.755) sa bhagavān dharmakāyena no tu rūpakāyena
XXvinv05_u:667: gacchāmy upādhyāya rūpakāyenāpi taṃ bhagavantaṃ drakṣyāmi /
XXvinv05_u:670: durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tadyathā
XXvinv05_u:672: asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasvālpābādhatāṃ ca yāvat sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca pañca praśnāni ca pṛccha /
XXvinv05_u:673: aśmāparāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukaṃ kṛcchreṇa daśavargagaṇaḥ paripūryate /
XXvinv05_u:676: aśmāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idam evaṃrūpam āstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā ajacarma gocarma mṛgacarma cchāgacarma /
XXvinv05_u:677: tad anyeṣu janapadeṣv idam evaṃrūpam āstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:678: evam evāśmāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣv idam evaṃrūpam āstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ (MSV IV 187) tadyathā ajacarma pūrvavat* /
XXvinv05_u:683: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
XXvinv05_u:684: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇas tasyā eva rātrer atyāyāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXvinv05_u:686: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
XXvinv05_u:688: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
XXvinv05_u:689: gacchānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭīkarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñapaya /
XXvinv05_u:690: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānandas tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭīkarṇasya yāvat prajñapya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:692: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭīkarṇasyaikavihāre mañco yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate /
XXvinv05_u:693: atha bhagavān yena śroṇasya koṭīkarṇasya vihāras tenopasaṃkrānto yāvad vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ

XXvinv05_u:1115: yas tāvad asau bhikṣavaḥ śāstā sarvalokāmiṣasaṃmṛṣṭo bhavati tasya tāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakā naiva laghu laghv eva pātakavratam āpadyante /
XXvinv05_u:1118: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ upānahau dhārayanti tasmān na bhikṣuṇā upānahā dhārayitavyā iti
XXvinv05_u:1121: sa pādadhāvanikāyāṃ pādau prakṣālya pānīyenāsyaṃ {MS: pānīyasyā[p]yaṃ}
XXvinv05_u:1132: na paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣuṃ vinā vāditreṇa nṛtyantam* /
XXvinv05_u:1134: jānakā pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti /
XXvinv05_u:1135: pṛcchati buddho bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣuṃ kim abhiprāyeṇa bhikṣo evaṃ kṛtam* /
XXvinv05_u:1141: / sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavaty argalakaṃ datvā dhārayitavyā /
XXvinv05_u:1155: tena khalu samayena dvayor ekapalāśikā upānahāḥ kriyante bhikṣūṇām uparatakānāṃ ca /
XXvinv05_u:1156: sa bhikṣur bhūyo bhūyaś carmakārasakāśam upasaṃkrāmati /
XXvinv05_u:1158: apareṇa samayena bhūyas tena gṛhapatinā sa bhikṣur dṛṣṭo 'nupānatkaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1160: ārya na tena śilpinā upānahā dattā /
XXvinv05_u:1161: gṛhapate na śrutaṃ tvayā durlabhaḥ śilpī satyajalpaka iti /
XXvinv05_u:1165: / sa tena gṛhaṃ nītvā praṇītenāhāreṇa santarpya bahupuṭī upānahā dattā /
XXvinv05_u:1171: sa tām ādāya śastrakaṃ ca vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā utpāṭayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1175: mama ca bahupuṭī eva saṃpannā ekapuṭīṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyāmi /
XXvinv05_u:1177: dāsyanti batāmī śrāddhā gṛhapatayaḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ bahupuṭī upānahā tasmād anujānāmi bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktena kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXvinv05_u:1179: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktebhiḥ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXvinv05_u:1181: antata upālin sapta vāṣṭa vā padāni parimuktāni bhavanti /
XXvinv05_u:1183: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ evaṃrūpā upānahāḥ kriyante /
XXvinv05_u:1184: tadyathā hinihināyamānāḥ kiṇikiṇāyamānā meṇḍaviṣāṇikā bodhipaṭapatrakāḥ citropacitrāḥ paṃcakārṣāpaṇamūlyāḥ
XXvinv05_u:1185: ṣaḍvargikair hi dṛṣṭo bhavati upānahā yāvat pidhāya te pārṣṇipādāṅguṣṭhena pāṭayitvā grīvāyāṃ mellayitvā gṛhṇantīdaṃ te dānaṃ cittālaṅkārāya /
XXvinv05_u:1193: tena dṛṣṭaḥ sa ekasmin gṛhe praviṣṭaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1195: sa tasmād gṛhān nirgatyāparaṃ gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1198: ārya kasyārthe tvaṃ māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1200: bhadramukha nāhaṃ tavopānahām apaharāmi tv ahaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi /
XXvinv05_u:1202: ārya hara vā mā vāpi tu yuṣmākaṃ sāmantakena śabdo visṛtaḥ -
XXvinv05_u:1206: yaḥ kaścid ādīnava iha bhikṣava evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayanti hinihinikā iti vistaraḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1207: (91r = GBM 6.764) tasmān na bhikṣuṇā evaṃrūpā upānahā dhārayitavyā
XXvinv05_u:1209: bhikṣur imām evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayati sātisāro bhavati /
XXvinv05_u:1211: tena khalu samayena bhikṣūṇām upānahābhiḥ pādapṛṣṭhe vraṇāni kṛtāni /
XXvinv05_u:1222: parvatam abhiruhatāṃ pādāṅguṣṭheṣu kṣatāni (MSV IV 208) bhavanti /
XXvinv05_u:1235: ṛkṣacarmam anujñātam ārā śastrī ca baddhikā //
XXvinv05_u:1249: yadā virūḍhakena mohapuruṣeṇa kāpilavāstavaḥ śākyāḥ praghātitāḥ tatra kecid uttarāpathaṃ gatāḥ kecid yāvan naivālaṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
XXvinv05_u:1267: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā haimavateṣu janapadeṣu pūlā dhārayitavyā iti /
XXvinv05_u:1278: kim eṣa ānanda bhikṣor lubdhakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ (MSV IV 210)
XXvinv05_u:1283: yadi śatasahasram api labhati sarvaṃ praghātayati /
XXvinv05_u:1292: yāvad asti mama kauśalaṃ yadi bhagavān anujānīyād granthayeyam* /
XXvinv05_u:1295: yasya kauśalaṃ vidyate tena pratigupte pradeśe sthitvā granthayitavyam* /
XXvinv05_u:1303: tasmād anujānāmi bhikṣuṇā ārā śastrakaṃ baddhikā ca dhārayitavyāḥ /
